# textViewDidChangeSelection(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the text selection changes in the specified text view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func textViewDidChangeSelection(_ textView: UITextView)
```

## Parameters

- **textView**: The text view whose selection changed.

## Discussion

Implementation of this method is optional. You can use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextView/selectedRange] property of the text view to get the new selection.
